findings.title: Pause Function Abuse to Manipulate Trades
findings.description: The team can abuse the pause function to manipulate trades and prevent users from selling.

findings.title: Minting new tokens, inflating price and decreasing existing user's value
findings.description: The contract owner has the ability to mint new tokens, which can lead to inflation of token price and decrease the value held by existing users.

findings.title: Contract Owner can prevent a single address from selling tokens
findings.description: The contract owner has the ability to restrict token sales from a specific address.

findings.title: Serve images in next-gen format
findings.description: Image formats like WebP and AVIF often provide better compression than PNG or JPEG, which means faster downloads and less data consumption.

findings.title: Eliminate render-blocking resources
findings.description: Resources are blocking the first paint of your page. Consider delivering critical JS/CSS inline and deferring all non-critical JS/styles.
